take forms in animals and the crafts can take forms of other buildings.  they mostly do fields and cow pastures.  i have a lengthly story .  they get here thru prisms, dimensions, shapes, solar and lunar energy, mind power, water, electricity, and a form of very advanced magnifying glass.  you have to be smart enough to understand the scientific part of it, such as time travel is possible, to believe the unoproven, other life, and also, the religious part of it, god is not a ghostly, imaniginary being..He is very real.  a being living somewhere else who can offer eternal life thru solar energy.  please get in contact with me. i have tons of information that can be very helpful...I can communicate, as they are still here,  i think they will be here til at least jult.  i have been given upcoming dates.  maybe things can be ptrvented.  i have some very mindblowing info that is too personal to mention here.  i am very serious, no drugs, no drinking, for real.  true to the bone. content.summary: There are two groups hjere, collecting energy that will be wasted, as the devils graveyards triangles, made with aluminumalloy, built into the earth, acting as a brake system are putting here brakes on.  i communicate with one daily. .

content.detailedDescription:
On wednesday the 6th of may,2015 while aboard an alaska airlines aircraft traveling from seattle wa. to las vegas nv.,i witnessed and filmed with my cell phone (iphone) two light anomalies. the lights were extremely bright and stationary. the altitude of the aircraft was approximately between 25,000 and 30,000 feet above the ground at the time of the sighting and was about 20 minutes outside of mccarran airport in las vegas where we were preparing to land. i first noticed the lights as i was looking out of the window and a glint of the objects caught my eye, for a moment i thought it was another aircraft approaching us, which startled me terribly because they appeared so very close to us. but after looking closer it seemed to be two stationary lights that seemed to emit a burst of light from each horizontal end almost like a pulse of light. 

on film it almost looks like a wave of heat or shimmer coming off the right anomaly. it reminds me of the heat wave pattern you see coming off of your car engine on a hot summer day. each light appeared to be a thin slanted line with a small horizontal line at the top outside edge of each light, the two shapes almost formed a v shape with the bottom portion of the v missing, almost like two modern day slanted car headlights. the video of them shows them more as round orb like objects, but they were definitely more thin and sharp in shape. they did not appear to be coming from the ground, because of their brightness, the altitude of the aircraft and size of the lights. i observed the lights for about 10-15 seconds before i grabbed my phone and managed to capture 20 or seconds of film. i lost sight of the object after the pilot began to turn right which made filming harder to do since we were already preparing to land and i had my seat belt on, but after filming i witnessed the lights for another 10 seconds or so before i could no longer see them. i am unaware if any other passengers witnessed or filmed these anomalies. shortly after filming the lights, we hit a pocket of extremely bad turbulence unlike i have witnessed in a very long time which most likely is just a coincidence, but i am including here for details about the event.
content.summary: I filmed two light anomalies while flying from seattle into las vegas, they appered extremely bright and emitted some sort of pulse or aura,

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting into my car to go eat at a restaurant where my sister in law worked. sun had just set (8-8:30) and observed the object for 10-15 mins. it was very bright and i had never seen anything that large and bright. first thought it was a b-52 from nearby march afb but it wasn't moving. this was odd so i stood there trying to figure out what it was. left to go eat and tried as often as possible to watch it. when i arrived at the restaurant (10 mins.) 

i had to practically drag my sister in law outside to see it. she was impressed but had to get back to work. i ate quickly and drove back home and had been about an hour from first observing it. still was in the same location and as close as i could tell, the exact location. i stood there watching and saw what looked like small aircraft flying around it 4-6 i would say and thy all flew off at about the same time slowly like a small airplane or helicopter. i decided to go next door to get witnesses as no one was at my home and two brothers whom i had never met, said come outside and check this out. they did and we walked across the street and observed it passing around a binocular silently. the object started moving away slowly and continued until out of sight maybe 20 mins. 

finally one brother said to the other "what did you see?". the other brother found a stick and drew what looked like 2 pie pans connected. his brother said "that's what i saw" and i chimmed in "me too".While looking through the binoculars the object appeared to be moving up and down fast, not far just enough to look out of focus is the best i can describe it. well... we stood there for some time saying what was that? all the time it was moving away and was about the size of a star, i heard a jet which actually was two fighter jets flying higher and faster than i had ever seen and commented "i can't believe there was no sonic boom" don't know if it was they were so high? i could clearly see 2 jets flying directly towards the object and said i don't think they are going to catch that thing. we all laughed and went home. that was 44 years ago and have told many people this story and have been interested in the topic ever since. 

two days ago saw for the first time gordon cooper's testimony and then ed mitchell's and led to discover the sirius disclosure project. i find it interesting that being an follower of news and programs concerning ufo's that i had to stumble across this info when it has existed for decades! i will do my part to try to spread the word for people to watch some of these testimonies. this info should be cataloged on youtube to make it easier for people that don't think they have 35 hours to watch it all. i am retired now and may be interested in helping in some way. the truth must come out!!! not sure what would happen afterwards when the whole world learns that not only ours but other gov'ts have been keeping what could be the salvation of this planet to weaponize it???? that is another subject. please let me know if there were others that reported the same one i saw. it was a clear late spring or summer day and other people must have been out and seen the same thing. i did wait 44 years to report it maybe others did the same. [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Large bright light hovered for 11/2 to 2 hrs. slowley moved away to nw. later saw fighter jets flying towards ufo

content.detailedDescription:
June 12, 2013

i was outside my house on a busy nyc street fixing my truck, installing a cb radio and was tuning the radio. i looked at the evening sky as the sky was nice looking of blue, orange (sun going down) i saw what i thought was the moon, but thought to myself i've never seen the moon and sun so close to each other at the same time. 

this light was round. i came outside of my truck to get a better look, to this day i have no idea how anyone else walking on my busy street did not see this. while looking at it from afar i noticed it never changed its shape, however just got brighter. this sphere came towards me, flow over my head and down my block towards the (south east) which is where the moon was a full moon.

the same light coming towards me was the same light flying se down my block, no sound, no seams, no windows - the light was so bright you could look straight into it without any eye-tearing. it was the best thing i saw in my life however after that i've been having a few more sightings not of the same but different all of the same in brooklyn ny
content.summary: Glowing bright white ball of light

content.detailedDescription: Silver reflective solid looking craft hovering on the horizon, just as the sun was setting. it was very prominent, and stood out against the backdrop of the sunset. the craft did not move, it hovered until i drove out of eye shot. the craft was more than 5 miles away, and it still looked enormous from that far away.
content.summary: Silver reflective solid looking craft hovering on the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I watched a jet after take off from billings mt on a sunny cloudless day go over yellowstone. i live one mile from the eastern side of the rockies. as i watched the contrails, (i'm a pilot) something came out and moved north (the jet was going west) along the rockies, it was a bluish gray slightly darker than the sky. i watched for several minutes, bright white crystals were blinding me as i watched for several minutes, then it disappeared. there was a small cloud where i could no longer see it travel. the crystals immediately disappeared as well. at first i assumed it was blue ice, but it was as large as a leer jet, at least. it was over the local airport that allows small aircraft only. i watch planes land there everyday but have never seen one that was camouflaged with the sky before. i am a senior and have never seen a ufo in my life.
content.summary: Jet take off from billings, i watched contrails, grayish plane? moved north of jet

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the player's championship on tv and noticed a weird object in the sky. when you see the pictures, people may think "oh that's a blimp" but after seeing the blimp in other clips, i can easily conclude it's not the blimp. i also looked for other aircrafts flying by and nothing seemed plausible. the object did have a reflective surface. in the picture you'll see a golf ball, a bird, and the flash reflection, while the other object is the unknown craft. you can also notice the object appears to be at a very high altitude for any aircrafts being used for the tournament. i rewind and slow motion fast fwd dozens of times. very strange.
content.summary: Was watching the player's golf tournament when i saw a weird object in the sky. it did reflect but too short of a view.

content.detailedDescription: Was 830-900 pm i had just got out of grocery store headed home turn headed south on 7th st coming from glendale ave headed toward bethany home halfway there i noticed a lot of activity in the sky i live in central phx so its always busy thought theres a lot of planes n stuff out tonite as got closer i was noticed those were not planes 10 or so  orbs looked orange w/ red center they were pretty high up but real close to the skyline last 10 or so mins from when i saw it by the time i got home to see if i could capture it on film all but four when still going the last one stay lit but very light flew straight up and went north
content.summary: Witnesses orbs over central phoenix

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my 2 more frinds were studying on terrace. one of my friend was lying on the floor n gazing the sky. suddenly he saw something up in the sky and made us see that object. it was bizarre.I thought it was an aeroplane but when it came straight above us ....We knew it was not an aeroplane . it was a cigar shaped object with 2 lights one at the bottom in front side and other in the back bottom side. the lights were pale yellow coloured. the object wan not making any sort of sound. it was moving in a straight path and disappeared quickly within minutes. we were shocked first. all 3 of us were standing like a statue and we couldn't remind ourselves of making video or something. we were completely shocked. we always wondered how would it feel to see a ufo n today we saw one of it.
we lost the sight of the object as it moved away from us and disappeared in the dark.
content.summary: It was a cigar shaped object moving ina straight path. no sound of flight was there and was very low in flight

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my girlfriend's house in socorro, tx at 2:30 a.M. on may 2, 2015, heading back to the main street from her subdivision, when i noticed a bright orange circle in the night sky. i was travelling westbound and the object was traveling towards me in a southeastern direction. the circle first appeared just to be a star or maybe a meteorite given the clear night sky, but it began to grow in brightness and then i noticed what appeared to be a conical exhaust coming out from the bottom of the object, which is unlike a plan that would have the exhaust visible behind it, not underneath it. i had lit a cigarette and had my windows rolled down but i heard no noise to accompany what i was witnessing in the sky. 

i pull over to try and get a better view of this and then the object grows in brightness and then suddenly dims and disappears and then all of my truck's lights went out, inside and outside, but my engine kept running. i switched them on and off and after about ten seconds they just suddenly came on. i noticed that the time on my cd player hadn't reset, which usually occurs when the power to the cd player is cut off (i.E. a dead battery or disconnecting the battery to work on the engine). i felt very numb and was at a loss of what to feel after witnessing that. i knew i was scared because of what i had just witnessed but was also very curious as i turned my truck around and drove around the neighborhood hoping to view the object once more or see something in the sky or on the ground that might help me make sense of what had occurred.
content.summary: Observed a bright orange glowing orb with a conical emission that made no noise and quickly dimmed before it exited the sky.

content.detailedDescription: was living in poulsbo, wa at the time and was getting set up on the back deck for amateur astro-photography.  i noticed the same glowing, hovering slowly drifting orange lights as those reported from kingston, about 10 miles away, on the same night. as i was set up with my telescope for the night, with my scope and binoculars and i was able to to confirm that they were simply "chinese lanterns" drifting with the wind that night.
content.summary: Same event as listed from kingston, wa on same night...Chinese lanterns

content.detailedDescription:
So i was trying to fall asleep when something caught my eye. i'm used to seeing planes fly by because of the nearby airport, of which this object came from the direction of and heading sw/s, but for some reason it caught my eye. it looked like a plan with eerie pulsating green lights. 
note that it had a solid white light much like a star but brighter and seemed more natural then artificial and what appeared to be 2 green lights were pulsating not blinking much like planes do. at this point i figured it was a strange plane and was just curious but then it just changed direction basically throwing itself in reverse for a quick second then hovered around. 
at first my mind couldn't comprehend it, i was thinking maybe the plane was doing a loop for some reason but then i realized that it must be a ufo, terrestrial or not (man made unknown craft or alien) i don't know, but it sure wasn't something normal. so i ran downstairs and outside to get a better view but my house is surrounded by forest and it was too far above the tree line to see so i could only view it from my from as no other windows aloud a viewpoint and i had to look out from an angle. 
i quickly rushed to get my dslr camera but it was too dark to pick anything up with my lens and my iphone couldn't pick it up either. when i first pointed my dslr at it, it moved behind a treeline where i could still make it out through the branches just a bit but if i were to even get a view of it in my camera it wouldn't have looked like much, it felt intelligent as if it did it in response to my trying to get it on my viewfinder but that could just be me over thinking it. so i kept viewing it, at this point i had been messaging my friends on facebook about it so that i could begin documenting what i saw. it shifted again from the treeline back to around where it first hovered in place but it seemed to get a bit closer to me to where i could make it out a bit better than just lights. finally i grabbed a notebook and began to draw what i was seeing now as soon as i was almost done and looked up a second time to compare what i drew to what i saw it was completely gone. i felt very eerie and scared afterwards but it could've been just my overactive imagination as i haven't read up on ufos and stuff in years and never thought this kind of thing would ever happen to me. i made sure to take notes and pictures documenting time, direction, no cloud cover, everything i could. earlier today before writing this my friend who was in my facebook chat i talked about earlier told me that his girlfriend had heard something over the local radio of somebody seeing something similar although i haven't gotten a chance to talk to them about it and will be doing so hopefully tonight but i'm not sure. if any more information is wanted or needed i'm more then happy to come forth with answers to anything i can as well as update on any new finding that corroborate my story.
content.summary: Notice what appeared to be a plane but then changed direction and hovered. hovered back and forth and did many movments over time of event before leaving sight. seemed intelligent.

content.detailedDescription:
Location :
[location removed]
time
1:30pm in the afternoon
weather :
clear sunny sky
equipment :
samsung note 4 smartphone


i was laying on the beach, while the weather was sunny, and no activity on the beach i heard an airplane and decide to film it.
aiming the camera towards to the airplane in the sky i discovered a very strange event.

while i was filming the airplane out of nothing a white orb/disk appeared, it came with extreme high velocity out of no where towards to the plane.
it came out of somewhere and it appeared to change appearance from a cross like shape to an orb/disk.

and while the airplane was flying the orb/disk was 'circling' around the plane, and flew away.
while the orb/disk was circling around the plane i heard a hum, and noticed a very large disk shaped object reddish in color in the direction of the sun.

while the small orb/disk disappeared the large disk disappeared as well.
content.summary: Orb near a plane

content.detailedDescription: My husband was driving  and i was taking  pictures from inside the car to the view going to el eldorado town, nevada then my tablet just got black,i tried to turn on the tablet and i don't know what happened with my tablet just turn off, few hours later when i was at home finally my tablet turn on, i can  see the pictures and noticed  few lights in the pictures
content.summary: Two objects appear  on my pictures

content.detailedDescription: Hi. my friend and i seen something really big in the sky tonight at 11:10 pm. we live in hope bc.  this object was huge and hovering towards our right with lights spinning around the object and when  we went to go chase it down it was gone. we couldn't see nothing in the sky. when i got home i googled ufo with lights and that is exactaly what her and i seen... the pic attached is exactaly what her and i seen as i googled ufo with lights and that pic came up and that is what we seen
content.summary: It was hovering with lights going around the huge oval object then it took off

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from work, excited to be home. when i slowed down to take the right turn onto my street, i noticed lights to my left. at first i thought "where are planes able to land around here???" i then actually turned and saw four orange orbs just hovering silently above a large evergreen. i took a breath, decided that if something were to happen to me i'd like to be on my property, and drove home. i wasn't scared. i became a bit distressed, after later analysis of the situation, when i realized the orbs in the triangle shape we're pointing in the direction of my home. i am unsure to take that as a threat or not. 

i believe it was two days after, when my neighbor introduced himself to my father, mentioned the "fact" that there has been around 40 sightings this month, and told my father that i shouldn't worry, that it was just him...

nine days after, a family down the street has a sign reading "alien family" on their front door. 

though i regret it, i did not get a photo.
content.summary: Appeared in front of my on the way home in my car. just four orange glowing orbs in a triangle shape pointing in direction of my home

content.detailedDescription:
Earlier tonight my mom and i were returning home from a shopping trip. i noticed a bright amber colored "star" in the sky. as i looked closer i knew this was too bright to be a star. as i called my mom's attention to it.. it moved. i sped up to a clearing in the trees and parked in a parking lot for a better look. we witnessed 3 of these pulsating white/orange/red orb like structures "dancing" in the sky. they began to move east. i followed them. 1 broke pattern and circled behind us swooping low in sky with no sound. it hovered overhead then headed back west. i turned car around to follow it. as we turned south toward our home the orb i had been watching stopped abruptly and darted south parallel with car. my mom and i switched places so that i could keep eye on object. 

we drove 3 miles south to our residence. as we pulled into driveway it darted again straight up over tree line. i called my brother and had him meet me outside. we proceeded to photograph and video object over next hour. as we concentrated on the 1 orb. several more started to appear. it was hard to distinguish them from stars until they flew in closer and began to take on orangeish hue. one came directly over our heads and just hovered silently. they all pulsated/flickered. it seemed as if when they were about to move they'd get dimmer almost go out completely then get real bright and move much closer at high speeds.

 my family returned inside after watching for over 1 hour. i remained outside and was determined to stay until they left. i watched planes fly in very close proximity to objects. after planes passed the orbs would trail them for a while and stop. after watching the orbs for 2 1/2 hours i came in because i believe i saw a much larger dark triangular shaped craft silhouetted against clouds. it had no lights and a very faint noise to it. at that time i believed that i was witnessing a legitimate ufo sighting and came inside to report immediately while details are still fresh. my brother also has video. his phone took much more detailed video than mine. but here are some stills of orbs. faint light pictured is when they were distant and appeared to be stars. the amber colored one was when it moved closer.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 different object seen. 1 black triangle-no lights- silhouette triangle shape against clouds. several orbs.

content.detailedDescription: A little after midnight i just happened to open my window and look up to the sky and saw a yellow light changing directions blinking.  at first i thought it could be a lightning bug but lightning bugs do not flicker tho fast.  upon further investigation i saw several lights up in the sky above my house shaped in a semi disk.  i had goosebumps and they still haven't left me as well as a heat sensation.  it felt as if something was watching us.  my mom also witnessed the entity.  it scared me to death.  i also observed lightning strikes more as heat lightning.
content.summary: Light entity changing directions made my lights flicker

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home at sun down home from rock-land maine to union maine. when i looked across lake chickeewaky and saw  across the lake. across the lake and above the trees high up was a large cigar shaped ufo it was so bright orange and reddish with 4 grayish round like windows. but don't think it could be windows cause they would have been unbelievable in size. as we passed object i got excited screaming to my wife who was driving did u see it and said no she was driving and went bye it in about 15 to 20 seconds. i begged her to turn around but she wouldn't. i never seen anything like this the object had to be the size of football field or bigger. ive flown plenty of times and been a fisherman my hole life and never seen anything like it in my life. i wasn't scared i was excited.
content.summary: Orange/red gray round like windows 4 of them huge object was sun was in wrong direction and was about gone. unbelieveable. huge long like cigar but could b triangle shape but from my view was cigar shape super bright it blew my mind i'm 44 yrs old.S

content.detailedDescription:
1. military gunnery range at yano range, fort knox ky.
2. came out of our holding barracks and seen the objects it the sky and being a military range nothing should be flying over it.
3. i had no idea what it was as i have seen all military aircraft and i am a paratrooper and know what aircraft we deal with and when it shuts down our training and range control has no idea it was strange.
4.3 lights on all 3 corners then a center dimmer light came over our encampment then went around the far side of the mountian and was observed by our range safety and they put the range into a check fire as sop and we never recived an explaination from range control as to what ac entered our space, i attempted to observe the ac under pvs 14 night vision but the corner lights were too bright and washed out my night vishion. 
5. i felt like i had just seen a ufo and me and my counter part at the time were basically like what the heck was that???? and no one could tell us what is was. i have told this story for years and i get nothing but jokes as it does sound absurd but it was up thier. weird thing was thier were a bunch of helicopters outside of our area for a while before we went hot??? and not looking like that ac that i seen.
6. the ac flew around the far side of the mountain by control tower were it was also seen and i am not sure what happened to it afterthat but it was gone and we continued training.
content.summary: Possible triangle over military training range

content.detailedDescription: I was out side on the back porch smoking a cigarette . looking at the stars like usual. and there it was a bright light in the distance
content.summary: Lights , blue , then yellow and green . and these red orbs appeared to. be. going in and out of the main light

content.detailedDescription: Took my kids to the waterfront park in saint marys. as we were leaving we saw a white disc shaped object heading west from the ocean  over the town. we watched it for about three minutes as it appeared to go over kingsland, georgia. as we observed this object we saw an airliner come into view from the same direction and going in the same direction. i'm not sure if this had any relation to the other.
content.summary: White disc moving west

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the city on a main road. i was out back doing laundry and i was walking towards the housing. i noticed the beautiful sky and clouds, so i decided to take pictures. i was watching an airplane pass over head above the clouds, beause of the lightening. then i noticed a cigar gray shaped object that was soundless going into the lightening cloud toward the east. i was watching very carefully thinking that it may have been an airplane, but then it came out of the cloud glowing going south. i zoomed my phone to take a picture and it turned back east in the lightening cloud. i stood there for five minutes recording video of the lightening and planes flying over head. 

it was not a plane because there were three in the vicinty going toward orlando at a high aptitude because of the lightening. this craft made no noise, did not have wings, started glowing, and was able to turn sharply when changing its direction.
content.summary: Flying through the clouds with lightening then it turned started glowing

content.detailedDescription:
I dont have good details about the date and time im 36yrs old now i was around 9 or 10 when this happened im hoping that my story can help me find out more information about what may or may not happened to me
hopefully someone else saw something that night or any information. the story starts as me and dad and my sister were going to mcdonald's to get something to eat around 9 or 10 pm its not the exact time it happened so long ago and i try to ask my sister if she remembers she doesn't like to talk about it. anyway we where heading north on hwy 494 about 4 miles before the city limits i saw a falling star it got my interest so i leaned forward to look straight up out windshield at the sky and there what looked like shooting stars continuously flying from left to right north to west back and forth both ways they were not falling just shooting back and forth for as long as i watched them it only took about 4 mins to get to town i couldn't see them anymore or didn't see them then i don't remember but there's lights in town and its dark and country like where we saw this so anyway we got our food and headed home on the same route in the same part of our trip we saw the flying stars a super big object caught my eye following the river in between the trees i don't know if it was moving but it seemed to be hovering following the river we didn't stop we were moving so i don't know if it was moving or not i told my dad and sister to look my dad didn't seem to take it serious or something i don't remember but we didn't stop the object seemed to be grey or lead color or something the only way i could see its shape was because it had very large round glowing lights along the center of it the lights didn't shine or cast shadows they just glowed the object looked like what id call a super-dome the stadium in new orleans so we kept going until i couldn't see it anymore if it was moving it was slow because we passed it up we got home ate or whatever my sister was so young she might not have cared and my dad acted uninterested all he would day as he saw it too but didn't seem to want to talk about it i still ask my sister to this day if she remembers it she say yes but don't go into talking about it. ok time for bed  i don't know who was up i went in my room and shut the door and went to bed.

 soon as i laid down i started feeling a presence outside my window like someone was there and looking at me it got stronger and stronger i got so scared i started praying very hard asking god to please help me i have never prayed so hard or been so scared in my life i put my head under the covers on my bed and prayed begging god to help me i took my head from under the covers and something like glitters or sparkles fell from the ceiling in my room all the sudden all the fear was gone it seemed like i was just overwhelmed with peace i went into a deep sleep all this only took like 5 mins but it seemed like forever when i was scared  i have never in my life felt that kind of fear. 

anyway in my dream i walked outside to the end of our pool all that was normal but when i got the the end where it slopes to go down to the river instead of the river the darkness of the night seemed to turn red it was like i was at the end of the world i could see planets and it was not black like in space it was like all a reddish haze like the atmospere or space or whereever i was was not black the planets i saw didnt look like earth does from space and it was not black there it was all this reddish haze.  that is all i remember about the dream the next day i would ask my dad did he remember again he would say yea but wouldnt talk about it nobody wants to talk about it i have told a couple friends they dont take it serious but i want to know if something happend to me its very serious to me i have to drink just to sleep mostly now through the years i have dreamed that a saucer shipped beamed my dads friend up the very next day they said he died this has happened to 2 of my dads good friends same dream of them getting beamed up over their houses next day my dad tells me they died i saw one of his friends wife a few months ago i got very emotional for some reason i told her about my dream she said she had the exact same dream we all lived on the river i saw the dome on its called cane river dads friends were named [name moved to fi section/cms/tg] and [name moved to fi section/cms/tg]  i have so many more stories over the years i hope someone in my area can talk to me serious about this about the last weird think is i woke up after a hard sleep i sat on the edge of my tub to put my socks on and i noticed i had 3 perfect circles in a triangle formation on the bottem of my foot they were light purplish red i touched them i didnt feel anything at all like if it was bruises it didnt feel nothing i went on with my day i told my friend about it i was going to show him but they were completly gone no trace of them like fading when a bruise heels. i have seen maps ive never seen before i have been places  cant explain in one dream i im driving in a location im familiar with all the sudden everything changes i start seeing people i have never seen and im lost i take my phone out to try to gps where i was it could not locate me i was completely lost as a kid i would have deja vu alot i had already expierienced things that that i had akready been to or happened every monday my head would hurt so bad i would bump my head on the wall or something just to make the headache move for just that instance . ive had a glowing in the road in front of me on the road not long ago it didnt have a shape it looked to be about 2 miles away i didnt know what it was but i got very scared and wanted to stop and not go to it but it vanished i have so many more stories i need someone to talk to that takes me serious and can maybe help me figure out if something is going with me or not o and the headaches just went away one day after a few years of having them
content.summary: This happened when i was a child my dad and sister also saw it

content.detailedDescription: I was fishing with a friend on the beach at balgowan south australia at around 1 am local time when we noticed a bright light over the ocean.At first we thought it was an areoplane or helicopter but it made no sound and stayed very still. the light hovered in place for around 3 hours. during this time a smaller light seemed to come out of the larger one it orbited the first light several times then rejoined or re-entered the larger light then after around 3 hours it sped off at an incredible speed out over the ocean and over the horizon. i felt very strange and unsettled by this sighting and will never forget the incident.
content.summary: Large bright light ejected a smaller light which orbited the large one several times then rejoined the large light after around 3 hours it sped off accross the ocean

content.detailedDescription:
We shot it. 3006 dear rifle. you have got to talk to me. you won't believe what it did. i was so close i could have touched it, when it got shot touch it. it, flew over us. it was dusky dark. too much to explain. i have something to tell that could be life changing. call me and i'll tell you what happened when we shot it and what it left behind.
i got a piece of it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: We were way out in the woods. miles from any people. got a real long close look. wow!

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
1) on the fourth of july, 2013, we were watching fireworks at the bay.
2) i first witnessed one craft which appeared to be hovering above the horizon at a 45 degree angle.  it had 2 lights with one blinking. i noticed it because it was stationary and higher than the fireworks.
3) i thought it was an airplane, however the lights started blinking erratically and it made no noise and hovered.  i then noticed another craft heading over to the hovering craft and then the two crafts quickly descended toward each other appearing to nearly collide and veering off camera.  
4) there were several different objects.  two crafts with 2-3 lights which blinked on/off.  then i noticed a candle-like fireball orb which appeared to come from this craft or become the orb.  there were rapid blinking lights in the sky red, then sequentially blinking in a boomerang pattern when i slowed the video footage down and analyzed it.
5) during the incident, another person who witnessed the objects came over to me and asked me what i felt and i thought it was a plane at first but now i believe it not to be a conventional aircraft.  i left thinking it was a plane, but after analyzing my video footage i believe it to be something else.
6) the orb disappeared out of sight and so did the craft at the end.

i would like to be contacted by a footage analyst, as the footage i have is multiple video clips which are of high quality and each several gigabytes.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Various blinking lights including several orb-like crafts with 1-3 blinking lights, boomerang craft with sequential lights and random lights

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was sitting with 2 friends on the corner street. i knoticed a bright light above my house, 1/2 mile away. light looked stationary. first thought it was a helicopter with a search light. it approached slowly taking 15-20 minutes. as it arrived, it flew just above street lights and trees. i followed as a friend looked for a camera. i raced on a 10 speed to try to beat it to an open area about 2 blocks away. 

i witnesses multiple beings in a blue-green interior light which were visible thru side windows. no sounds, but did feel some what of an electrical charge. within minutes a f-4 phantom made attack run and came within feet of the ground (corn field). ufo left at tremendous speed wsw direction (est mach 8+). i was shaken, disturbed and excited. i went to another friends house (took 5-8 minutes) where we counted dozens of military aircraft over head. 
one friend who's house we were in front of and made multiple inquiries that night (tv/airport) was visited by 2 men and threatened. he never spoke of it again. the other who also witnessed and was quite vocal about the sighting, was killed within a month by a hit and run driver.
i brought the subject up to a neighbor and he said he saw something that night. i got 2 sketch pads and told him to draw what he saw while i did the same. the drawings matched with every detail. both of us had lost an hours time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Angluar sides, bulbious front light 6ft x 20ft, ~30ftw x 50flt x 20ftht

content.detailedDescription: Myself,my two brothers and several of our cousins were gathered at my aunts house on [removed location] celebrating her marriage. the group of us kids went for a walk down the road to where there was a trail leading up a small mountain to a cleared out area on top used by a local church for picnics. we all went up to the top and were kicking around a soccer ball. at one point the ball went off the back side of the clearing and into the spindly pine trees that were roughly 30 to 40 feet tall. i went down to retrieve the ball and once having it, i happened to look up into the tree tops.  this is when i observed a circular bowl-like depression roughly 40 to 50 feet in diameter in the tree tops. the depression was maybe 15 to 20 feet deep at it's center point. i ran up to the clearing again and told my brothers and cousins about it and we all went back down to look at it. everyone was speculating as to what had caused the depression. some said it was a tornado type wind. we discussed this and it was unanimous that this was not the cause of the depression because all the tree tops were laid out in the shape of a "bowl" with the tree tops laid out evenly all around and not twisted in a circle as if caused by a circular wind like a tornado. we discussed this situation for some time and could not determine what may have caused the depression in the trees.  the only thing we could think of that could cause such a depression was a ufo.  we all laughed about this but could not determine any other explanation that would explain the cause of the depression. this explanation sort of spooked us so we decided to go on back down to my aunts house. eventually, being young kids with no experience investigating ufos or knowledge of organization that investigated such, we just let the experience fade away into our past. i have discussed this sighting with both my brothers and they remember it vividly. i, as well as my two brothers have experienced other sightings of suspicious lights in the night skies that were obviously not from known air craft due to their movements in speed and angle of flight.
content.summary: Observed possible landing site

content.detailedDescription: On a summer evening (i'm about 5-6 yrs old)i'm sleeping on my bed by the open window, facing e. i "woke up" facing the baseball field across the street. there was an orange glowing ufo across the street sitting on the entire dirt part of the baseball field. my whole family 2 brothers, 3 sisters mom went out to it. we went across the street walking in a dreamlike state. all of my neighborhood friends were there too, and their families (at least 3 coming from all directions). everyone was calm. i remember walking up the ramp that was facing nnw 2 by 2. (i'm around in the middle) i"m thinking i don't like this, but could not stop myself from going in. inside was still the orange glow. the next thing i remember is there are many different small rooms. (being older now i'll say 6x10). there's medical equipment in my room and 3-4 beings, things, "doctors" all with their backs to me. they had aprons on, medical masks. (i remember this because their cloths reminded me of the hospital). i don't remember how i got up on to the exam table, but when they turned around i started screaming. i don't remember hearing my screams, or how they muffled it. they had big dark almond shape eyes. one or two started "working" on my left knee, and another one or two were up by my shoulders and this long large machine started coming down from the ceiling towards my left eye. i remember telling myself "their doing something to my knee", i could feel something going under my kneecap right where they were just touching poking for a spot. the machine is now so close to my eye its going to go in...I don't know if i fainted, but the next morning i woke up and told my sister and brother about this weird "dream" i had about the ufo and what they did to me. i looked at my knee and there was a healed scar that wasn't there when i went to bed. as i'm telling them they said they had the exact same dream about the orange glow ufo being across the street walking to it... they had healed scars in different places than i that weren't there when they went to bed too. so did our friends. i have always remembered this. recently i asked two of my sisters if they remember that day, and they do. the oldest sister said the scars are triangle on her, and low and behold, so are mine. interestingly at the baseball field, they have never had to mow the grass again because it never grew back! it always remained dirt. it never grew grass again. i certify this is 100% truth to the best of my ability and memory. i believe if we go there and test the ground it still may have evidence of radiation like they leave. my sisters are willing to talk with you also if need be. i can draw what i saw if need be, but currently there are no known photos at least from my family. i'm not sure about the other families if they took pictures or not.
content.summary: Woke up to an orange glowing ufo across street in baseball field in dreamlike state entire neighboorhood went in all came out with scar not there beforehand. all had same dream same night
